long_description: Offering high levels of performance, the Teva Toachi 2 water sandals ensure excellent traction, quick-drying comfort and plenty of support to keep feet happy in the water. Universal synthetic leather strapping system with rip-and-stick tabs and quick-release buckles offers a secure and easy fit; padded heel straps give added comfort. Soft neoprene linings are comfortable against bare skin and dry quickly. Microban(R) zinc-based antimicrobial treatment helps deter odor development. Soft, compression-molded EVA midsoles with Shoc Pad(TM) in heels absorb shock and transfer it for enhanced push-off energy. Full-length thermoplastic urethane shanks wrap up into the straps to supply excellent stability and support. Drain Frame platform sends water out through the midsoles and outsoles to maximize water drainage and facilitate airflow. Nonmarking Spider Rubber(R) outsoles feature an aggressive lug design that bites into mixed terrain and sheds debris that can slow you down.
short_description: Offering high levels of performance, the Teva Toachi 2 water sandals ensure excellent traction, quick-drying comfort and plenty of support to keep feet happy in the water.
